message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. Accept and we can end this.
You're lowballing me, Alice. I think I deserve more.
You think you deserve more? I'm not convinced, Bob. I'll make a counteroffer.
Meet me in the middle, Bob. This is a fair offer.
You're getting closer, Alice, but I still think I deserve more. Meet me at 6000 and we can end this.
You're getting closer, but I'm not quite there yet, Bob. I'll counteroffer at 5000.
I'm getting close to your number, Bob. Let's meet at 5200 and end this.
I'm willing to compromise, Alice. 50/50 sounds fair to me. Let's end this.
Alright, Bob. 50/50 it is. Let's call it a day.
